analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is indivisible, not to be divided into two as pure and impure.🔽The transcendent perfection of generosity is pure because the sensory element of the nose is pure.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The sensory element of the nose is pure because the sensory element of olfactory consciousness is pure.🔽The sensory element of olfactory consciousness is pure because the sensory element of mental consciousness is pure.

translated: In this way, O gods, the transcendent perfection of generosity and the sensory element of the nose, the sensory element of olfactory consciousness, and the sensory element of mental consciousness are indivisible, not to be divided into two as pure and impure.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is indivisible, not to be divided into two as pure and impure.

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /

translated: the purity of the emptiness of internal phenomena and the purity of the sensory element of the body and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible:

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not distinct from one another.

original: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of external phenomena is the purity of the sensory element of the mental faculty.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the sensory element of the mental faculty is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of inner emptiness and the purity of the sensory element of the eyes are not two, and are not divided.🔽The purity of inner emptiness and the purity of the sensory element of sights are not two, and are not divided.🔽The purity of inner emptiness and the purity of the sensory element of visual consciousness are not two, and are not divided.🔽The purity of inner emptiness and the purity of the sensory element of the ears are not two, and are not divided.

original: nang stong pa nyid rnam par @412a *//🔽dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam par @412a *// dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of inner emptiness and the purity of the sensory element of sounds are not two, and are not divided.🔽The purity of inner emptiness and the purity of the sensory element of auditory consciousness are not two, and are not divided.

original: de ltar na nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of inner emptiness and the purity of the sensory element of the nose are not two, and are not divided.

original: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense field of smells.🔽The purity of the sense field of smells is the purity of the sense field of the nose.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na /
translated: The purity of the sense field of the nose is the purity of the sense field of olfactory consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense field of olfactory consciousness is the purity of the sense field of mental phenomena.🔽The purity of the sense field of mental phenomena is the purity of the sense field of the mind.🔽The purity of the sense field of the mind is the purity of the sense field of mental consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense field of mental consciousness is the purity of the sense field of contact.

original: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

translated: The purity of the sense field of contact is the purity of the sense field of feeling.🔽The purity of the sense field of feeling is the purity of the sense field of craving.🔽The purity of the sense field of craving is the purity of the sense field of appropriation.🔽The purity of the sense field of appropriation is the purity of the sense field of existence.

original: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense field of existence is the purity of the sense field of birth.🔽The purity of the sense field of birth is the purity of the sense field of old age and death.🔽The purity of the sense field of old age and death is the purity of the sense field of ignorance.🔽The purity of the sense field of ignorance is the purity of the sense field of the eyes.🔽The purity of the sense field of the eyes is the purity of the sense field of sights.🔽The purity of the sense field of sights is the purity of the sense field of visual consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense field of visual consciousness is the purity of the sense field of contact.🔽The purity of the sense field of contact is the purity of the sense field of feeling.🔽The purity of the sense field of feeling is the purity of the sense field of craving.🔽The purity of the sense field of craving is the purity of the sense field of appropriation.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /

analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of external phenomena is the purity of perceptions.

analyzed: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of external phenomena is the purity of formative predispositions.

original: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

translated: Thus,🔽the purity of external emptiness and the purity of volitional factors and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are without duality and cannot be made dual; they are not separate and not different.

analyzed: de ltar na /

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na /
translated: The purification of external emptiness and the purification of the sensory element of olfactory consciousness are not two and are not divided.🔽The purification of external emptiness and the purification of the sensory element of gustatory consciousness are not two and are not divided.

original: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purification of external emptiness and the purification of the sensory element of tactile consciousness are not two and are not divided.

original: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of external emptiness and the purification of the sensory element of the mental faculty are not two and are not divided.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of mental contact.

original: de ltar na /🔽phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus @417a *//
analyzed: de ltar na / phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus @417a *//
translated: Thus,

original: te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of outer emptiness and the purity of mental contact and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: They are not broken apart, not cut apart, and are not different.🔽The purity of the sense field of phenomena is due to the purity of the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of internal phenomena is due to the purity of the sense field of phenomena.

original: de ltar na phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purification of external emptiness and the purification of the conditioned arising of contact through the coming together of eye and form and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.🔽“The purification of external emptiness is the purification of the conditioned arising of contact through the coming together of ear and sound.

original: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the conditioned arising of contact through the coming together of ear and sound is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Thus,🔽the purification of external emptiness and the purification of the conditioned arising of contact through the coming together of ear and sound and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,🔽are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.🔽“The purification of external emptiness is the purification of the conditioned arising of contact through the coming together of nose and smells.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the conditioned arising of contact through the coming together of nose and smells is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,🔽the purification of external emptiness and the purification of the conditioned arising of contact through the coming together of nose and smells and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,🔽are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.🔽“The purification of external emptiness is the purification of the conditioned arising of contact through the coming together of tongue and tastes.🔽The purification of the conditioned arising of contact through the coming together of tongue and tastes is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Thus,

original: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purification of external emptiness and the purification of the conditioned arising of contact through the coming together of tongue and tastes and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.

original: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense field of smells.🔽The purity of the sense field of smells is the purity of the sense field of the nose.🔽The purity of the sense field of the nose is the purity of the sense field of tangible objects.🔽The purity of the sense field of tangible objects is the purity of the sense field of the mental object.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na /
translated: The purity of the sense field of the mental object is the purity of the sense field of the mind.🔽The purity of the sense field of the mind is the purity of the sense field of mental consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense field of mental consciousness is the purity of the sense field of form.🔽The purity of the sense field of form is the purity of the sense field of sound.🔽The purity of the sense field of sound is the purity of the sense field of smell.🔽The purity of the sense field of smell is the purity of the sense field of taste.

translated: The purity of the sense field of taste is the purity of the sense field of tangible objects.🔽The purity of the sense field of tangible objects is the purity of the sense field of the eye.🔽The purity of the sense field of the eye is the purity of the sense field of the ear.🔽The purity of the sense field of the ear is the purity of the sense field of the nose.🔽The purity of the sense field of the nose is the purity of the sense field of the tongue.🔽The purity of the sense field of the tongue is the purity of the sense field of the body.🔽The purity of the sense field of the body is the purity of the sense field of the mental faculty.

analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense field of the mental faculty is the purity of the sense field of the mental consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense field of the mental consciousness is the purity of the sense field of the Dharma.🔽The purity of the sense field of the Dharma is the purity of the sense field of the mental consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense field of the mental consciousness is the purity of the sense field of the mental faculty.🔽The purity of the sense field of the mental faculty is the purity of the sense field of the body.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /

analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of external phenomena and the purity of the sensory experience of taste as a condition of contact are indivisible.🔽There is no duality, no division into two.🔽The purity of the emptiness of external phenomena and the purity of the sensory experience of touch as a condition of contact are indivisible.🔽The purity of the sensory experience of touch as a condition of contact and the purity of omniscience are indivisible.🔽There is no duality, no division into two.🔽

original: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense-­faculties’ contact condition’s feeling is the purity of the emptiness of external phenomena.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of external phenomena is the purity of the sense-­faculties’ contact condition’s feeling.

original: de ltar na /🔽phyi stong pa nyid rnam @418a *//
analyzed: de ltar na / phyi stong pa nyid rnam @418a *//
translated: Thus,

original: par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: the purity of the emptiness of external phenomena and the purity of the sense-­faculties’ contact condition’s feeling and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing, not two or three.🔽The purity of the sense-­faculties’ contact condition’s feeling is the purity of the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena.

original: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena is the purity of the sense-­faculties’ contact condition’s feeling.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,🔽the purity of the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena and the purity of the sense-­faculties’ contact condition’s feeling and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing, not two or three.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of the external and the purity of form and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects do not make two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: and so on up to: are not two and are not sundered.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of the external and the purity of feeling🔽and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects do not make two,🔽and so on up to: are not two and are not sundered.🔽The purity of the emptiness of the external and the purity of perception

original: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects do not make two,

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: and so on up to: are not two and are not sundered.🔽The purity of the emptiness of the external and the purity of volitional factors

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects do not make two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: and so on up to: are not two and are not sundered.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of the external and the purity of consciousness🔽and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects do not make two,🔽and so on up to: are not two and are not sundered.

original: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of perception.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: the purity of the emptiness of the internal and the external and the purity of perception and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not become dissimilar.

analyzed: @418b phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /

original: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not become dissimilar.

analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

translated: The purity of the eye is due to the purity of the emptiness of the external and the internal.

original: mig rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of the eye.

original: de ltar na /

translated: Thus,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: the purity of the emptiness of the external and the internal and the purity of the eye and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,🔽are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not make different categories.

translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purity of the inner sense fields is the purity of the outer sense fields.

analyzed: rna ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,🔽the purity of the inner sense fields and the purity of the outer sense fields are indivisible: they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated.🔽The purity of the inner sense fields is the purity of the outer sense fields.

translated: The purity of the emptiness of the external and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are one thing, not two, not divided.🔽The purity of the emptiness of the external and the purity of the knowledge of

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the mental consciousness is due to the purity of the emptiness of the external and the internal.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of the mental consciousness.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the emptiness of the external and the internal, the purity of the mental consciousness, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and are not divided.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not cut apart, and are not different.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sensory element of the eyes is due to the purity of the emptiness of the external and the internal.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of the sensory element of the eyes.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /

translated: The purification of the emptiness of the external and the purification of the sense field of the eyes are not two, and are not divided.🔽The purification of the emptiness of the external and the purification of the sense field of the ears are not two, and are not divided.

translated: The purification of the emptiness of the external and the purification of the sense field of the nose are not two, and are not divided.🔽The purification of the emptiness of the external and the purification of the sense field of the tongue are not two, and are not divided.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the emptiness of the external and the purification of the sense field of the body are not two, and are not divided.🔽The purification of the emptiness of the external and the purification of the sense field of the mind are not two, and are not divided.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na /
translated: The purity of the sense-field of tangible objects is the purity of the sense-field of the body.🔽The purity of the sense-field of the body is the purity of the sense-field of mental objects.🔽The purity of the sense-field of mental objects is the purity of the sense-field of mind.🔽The purity of the sense-field of mind is the purity of the sense-field of mental consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense-field of mental consciousness is the purity of the sense-field of form.🔽The purity of the sense-field of form is the purity of the sense-field of sound.🔽The purity of the sense-field of sound is the purity of the sense-field of smell.🔽The purity of the sense-field of smell is the purity of the sense-field of taste.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

translated: The purity of the sense-field of taste is the purity of the sense-field of tangible objects.🔽The purity of the sense-field of tangible objects is the purity of the sense-field of mental objects.🔽The purity of the sense-field of mental objects is the purity of the sense-field of the eye.🔽The purity of the sense-field of the eye is the purity of the sense-field of the ear.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense-field of the ear is the purity of the sense-field of the nose.🔽The purity of the sense-field of the nose is the purity of the sense-field of the tongue.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na /
translated: The purity of the sense-field of the tongue is the purity of the sense-field of the body.🔽The purity of the sense-field of the body is the purity of the sense-field of the mind.🔽The purity of the sense-field of the mind is the purity of the sense-field of the eye.🔽The purity of the sense-field of the eye is the purity of the sense-field of the ear.🔽The purity of the sense-field of the ear is the purity of the sense-field of the nose.🔽The purity of the sense-field of the nose is the purity of the sense-field of the tongue.

analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: It is indivisible, not to be divided into two as ‘this is emptiness’ and ‘that is the sense-spheres.🔽The purity of the sense-sphere of the body is the purity of inner emptiness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of inner emptiness is the purity of the sense-sphere of the body.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: the purity of the sense-sphere of the body and the purity of inner emptiness are indivisible, not two, not separate, and not differentiable.🔽The purity of the sense-sphere of the mind is the purity of inner emptiness.

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam @422a *// pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of inner emptiness is the purity of the sense-sphere of the mind.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,🔽the purity of the sense-sphere of the mind and the purity of inner emptiness are indivisible, not two, not separate, and not differentiable.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purification of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena and the purification of mental contact are one and the same with the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena is the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of eye, form, and consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of eye, form, and consciousness is the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purification of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the coming together of eye, form, and consciousness, and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects are one and the same with the purification of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense field of olfactory consciousness is the purity of the sense field of mental phenomena.🔽The purity of the sense field of mental phenomena is the purity of the sense field of the mind.🔽The purity of the sense field of the mind is the purity of the sense field of mental consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense field of mental consciousness is the purity of the sense field of contact.🔽The purity of the sense field of contact is the purity of the sense field of feeling.🔽The purity of the sense field of feeling is the purity of the sense field of craving.🔽The purity of the sense field of craving is the purity of the sense field of appropriation.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the sense field of appropriation is the purity of the sense field of existence.🔽The purity of the sense field of existence is the purity of the sense field of birth.🔽The purity of the sense field of birth is the purity of the sense field of old age and death.🔽The purity of the sense field of old age and death is the purity of the perfection of giving.🔽The purity of the perfection of giving is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the perfection of patience is the purity of the perfection of perseverance.🔽The purity of the perfection of perseverance is the purity of the perfection of concentration.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The purity of the perfection of wisdom is the purity of inner emptiness.🔽The purity of inner emptiness is the purity of outer emptiness.🔽The purity of outer emptiness is the purity of inner and outer emptiness.

original: de ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of inner and outer emptiness is the purity of the emptiness of emptiness.🔽The purity of the emptiness of emptiness is the purity of great emptiness.🔽The purity of great emptiness is the purity of the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽The purity of the emptiness of ultimate reality is the purity of the emptiness of the compounded.🔽The purity of the emptiness of the compounded is the purity of the emptiness of the uncompounded.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg @422b pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa / sna'i 'dus te reg @422b pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of the uncompounded is the purity of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

translated: The

translated: The purification of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena is the purification of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue.

original: chen po stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of feeling is due to the purity of the emptiness of the great.

original: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of feeling.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: chen po stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the emptiness of the great and the purity of feeling and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not make different categories.

analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of perception.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: chen po stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the emptiness of the great and the purity of perception and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,🔽are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not make different categories.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is indivisible, not to be divided into two as this and that.

analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of volitional factors.

original: de ltar na /🔽chen po @429a *//
analyzed: de ltar na / chen po @429a *//
translated: Thus,🔽the purity of the emptiness of great extent,

translated: The purity of the sense field of the eyes.🔽The purity of the sense field of the eyes is the purity of the sense field of sights.🔽The purity of the sense field of sights is the purity of the sense field of eye consciousness.🔽The purity of the sense field of eye consciousness is the purity of the sense field of eye contact.🔽The purity of the sense field of eye contact is the purity of the sense field of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na /
translated: The purity of the sense field of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is the purity of the perfection of giving.🔽The purity of the perfection of giving is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the perfection of patience is the purity of the perfection of perseverance.🔽The purity of the perfection of perseverance is the purity of the perfection of concentration.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The purity of the perfection of wisdom is the purity of inner emptiness.🔽The purity of inner emptiness is the purity of outer emptiness.🔽The purity of outer emptiness is the purity of inner and outer emptiness.🔽The purity of inner and outer emptiness is the purity of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

translated: The purity of the emptiness of emptiness is the purity of great emptiness.🔽The purity of great emptiness is the purity of the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽The purity of the emptiness of ultimate reality is the purity of the emptiness of the compounded.

original: chen po stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of the compounded is the purity of the emptiness of the uncompounded.🔽The purity of the emptiness of the uncompounded is the purity of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽The purity of what is beyond extremes is the purity of the emptiness of no beginning and no end.🔽The purity of the emptiness of no beginning and no end is the purity of the emptiness of non-discarded.🔽The purity of the emptiness of non-discarded is the purity of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The purity of the emptiness of inherent existence is the purity of the emptiness of all things.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na /

translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena and the purification of the sense field of the nose are indivisible: they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not divided into two.🔽The emptiness of conditioned phenomena and the purification of the sense field of the tongue are indivisible: they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not divided into two.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena and the purification of the sense field of the body are indivisible: they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not divided into two.🔽The emptiness of conditioned phenomena and the purification of the sense field of mental objects are indivisible: they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not divided into two.🔽“Thus, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena and the purification of the sense field of mental objects are indivisible: they cannot be separated, they cannot be differentiated, and they are not divided into two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is indivisible, not to be divided into two as pure and impure.🔽The purity of conditioned emptiness is the purity of the sensory element of the nose.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the nose is the purity of the sensory element of odors.🔽The purity of the sensory element of odors is the purity of the sensory element of olfactory consciousness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sensory element of olfactory consciousness is the purity of the sensory element of the tongue.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the tongue is the purity of the sensory element of tastes.🔽The purity of the sensory element of tastes is the purity of the sensory element of gustatory consciousness.🔽The purity of the sensory element of gustatory consciousness is the purity of the sensory element of the body.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the body is the purity of the sensory element of tangibles.🔽The purity of the sensory element of tangibles is the purity of the sensory element of tactile consciousness.🔽The purity of the sensory element of tactile consciousness is the purity of the sensory element of the mental faculty.🔽The purity of the sensory element of the mental faculty is the purity of the sensory element of mental phenomena.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na /
translated: The purity of the sensory element of mental phenomena is the purity of the sensory element of mental consciousness.🔽The purity of the sensory element of mental consciousness is the purity of the perfection of giving.🔽The purity of the perfection of giving is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the perfection of patience is the purity of the perfection of perseverance.🔽The purity of the perfection of perseverance is the purity of the perfection of concentration.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The purity of the perfection of wisdom is the purity of the emptiness of internal phenomena.🔽The purity of the emptiness of internal phenomena is the purity of the emptiness of external phenomena.🔽The purity of the emptiness of external phenomena is the purity of the emptiness of both internal and external phenomena.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of the emptiness of both internal and external phenomena is the purity of the emptiness of emptiness.🔽The purity of the emptiness of emptiness is the purity of the great emptiness.🔽The purity of the great emptiness is the purity of the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽The purity of the emptiness of ultimate reality is the purity of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa @444a *//
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa @444a *//
translated: The purity of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is the purity

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the emptiness of the compounded🔽and the purification of the tactile sensations arising from contact through the coming together of the body and its object

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: are one thing and not two.🔽The purification of the tactile sensations arising from contact through the coming together of the body and its object🔽and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects🔽are one thing and not two.🔽The purification of the emptiness of the compounded🔽and the purification of the tactile sensations arising from contact through the coming together of the body and its object🔽are one thing and not two.🔽The purification of the tactile sensations arising from contact through the coming together of the body and its object

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects🔽are one thing and not two.🔽The purification of the emptiness of the compounded🔽and the purification of the tactile sensations arising from contact through the coming together of the body and its object🔽are one thing and not two.🔽The purification of the tactile sensations arising from contact through the coming together of the body and its object🔽and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are one thing and not two.🔽The purification of the emptiness of the compounded🔽and the purification of the tactile sensations arising from contact through the coming together of the body and its object🔽are one thing and not two.🔽The purification of the tactile sensations arising from contact through the coming together of the body and its object

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects🔽are one thing and not two.🔽The purification of the emptiness of the compounded🔽and the purification of the tactile sensations arising from contact through the coming together of the body and its object🔽are one thing and not two.🔽The purification of the tactile sensations arising from contact through the coming together of the body and its object🔽and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects🔽are one thing and not two.🔽The purification of the emptiness of the compounded

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: and the purification of the tactile sensations arising from contact through the coming together of the body and its object

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: are one thing and not two.🔽The purification of the tactile sensations arising from contact through the coming together of the body and its object🔽and the purification of the knowledge of all aspects🔽are one thing and not two.🔽The purification of the emptiness of the compounded🔽and the purification of the tactile sensations arising from contact through the coming together of the body and its object

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned being pure, the tactile perception conditioned by the coming together of the body and its object being pure, and the knowledge of all aspects being pure are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned being pure, the tactile perception conditioned by the coming together of the body and its object being pure, and the knowledge of all aspects being pure are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na /
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned being pure, the tactile perception conditioned by the coming together of the body and its object being pure, and the knowledge of all aspects being pure are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned being pure, the tactile perception conditioned by the coming together of the body and its object being pure, and the knowledge of all aspects being pure are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is not two, nor is it divided, nor is it cut apart.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par @444b dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par @444b dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of form is due to the purity of the emptiness of the uncompounded.

original: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of form.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the emptiness of the uncompounded and the purity of form and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: nor are they divided.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of feeling is due to the purity of the emptiness of the uncompounded.

original: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of feeling.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purification of the emptiness of the unconditioned and the purification of feeling

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not two, nor are they divided.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is purified, and perception is purified.

original: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Perception is purified, and the knowledge of all aspects is purified.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purification of the emptiness of the unconditioned and the purification of perception

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not two, nor are they divided.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is purified, and the formative predispositions are purified.

original: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of compounded things.

original: de ltar na /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / 'du byed rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa @445a *//
analyzed: de ltar na / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / 'du byed rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa @445a *//
translated: Thus,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the emptiness of the uncompounded and the purity of compounded things and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not made divisible. They are not separate.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of consciousness is due to the purity of the emptiness of the uncompounded.

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the knowledge of all aspects is due to the purity of consciousness.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the emptiness of the uncompounded and the purity of consciousness and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not made divisible. They are not separate.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig rnam par dag pa /
translated: The emptiness of the uncompounded being pure, the eyes are pure.

original: mig rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The eyes being pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mig rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the emptiness of the uncompounded being pure and the eyes being pure and the knowledge of all aspects being pure are not two and cannot be made two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not separate, and not distinct.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rna ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rna ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The emptiness of the uncompounded being pure, the ears are pure.

original: rna ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The ears being pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the emptiness of the uncompounded being pure and the ears being pure and the knowledge of all aspects being pure are not two and cannot be made two.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is not two, nor is it divided, nor is it cut in half.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam @445b par dag pas sna rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam @445b par dag pas sna rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the non-production of form is the purity of the sense-spheres.

original: sna rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sna rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the sense-spheres is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sna rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas lce rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the non-production of form is the purity of the sense of smell.

analyzed: lce rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the sense of smell is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lce rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas lus rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas lus rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the body is due to the purity of the emptiness of the uncompounded.

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / yid rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

translated: The purity of phenomena is the purity of the sensory element of mental consciousness.🔽The purity of the sensory element of mental consciousness is the purity of the perfection of giving.🔽The purity of the perfection of giving is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the perfection of patience is the purity of the perfection of perseverance.🔽The purity of the perfection of perseverance is the purity of the perfection of concentration.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is not two, nor is it divided, nor is it cut in half.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sensation that arises from the condition of eye contact is the purity of the perfection of giving.🔽The purity of the perfection of giving is the purity of the perfection of morality.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality is the purity of the perfection of patience.🔽The purity of the perfection of patience is the purity of the perfection of perseverance.🔽The purity of the perfection of perseverance is the purity of the perfection of concentration.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the perfection of concentration is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The purity of the perfection of wisdom is the purity of inner emptiness.🔽The purity of inner emptiness is the purity of outer emptiness.🔽The purity of outer emptiness is the purity of inner and outer emptiness.🔽The purity of inner and outer emptiness is the purity of the emptiness of emptiness.🔽The purity of the emptiness of emptiness is the purity of great emptiness.🔽The purity of great emptiness is the purity of ultimate emptiness.🔽The purity of ultimate emptiness is the purity of the emptiness of the compounded.🔽The purity of the emptiness of the compounded is the purity of the emptiness of the uncompounded.🔽The purity of the emptiness of the uncompounded is the purity of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽The purity of what is beyond extremes is the purity of the emptiness of no beginning and no end.
